items.text: short of a length on middle stump, gets on the back foot and taps it to short fine's right

items.text: short ball outside off. Punched back firmly at the bowler, who deflects it towards long-on

items.text: length ball on the pads, slides in and deflects to short fine as he looks to flick

items.text: length on middle, steps out and slugs it out to deep midwicket off the inside half

items.text: length ball down leg side, left alone
items.shortText: Gayle to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 wide

items.text: short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper's left
items.shortText: Gayle to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, steps out and jams it into the pitch. On the bounce to extra cover
items.postText: Ebrahim: "In your opinion, is Gayle and Nurse's spell due to the dual left handers or the wicket? Perhaps both?" --- That and I think he's concerned about how Keemo Paul has bowled today. Has to get the overs out from somewhere.
items.shortText: Gayle to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: tossed up at off stump, driven on the bounce into the covers
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: full on leg stump, driven back to the bowler
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: top edge to deep square. It was coming. They were both getting restless, and it's Shakib who goes first. Length ball looped right up at middle stump. Looks to go for the big slog sweep and ends up getting a top-edge. It's how you got the oversized slogger out at high school level - toss it right up. Shakib, among the elite allrounders in the world, will not be happy with that
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, OUT

dismissal.text: Shakib Al Hasan c Paul b Nurse 37 (44b 3x4 0x6) SR: 84.09

items.text: tossed up at a length outside off, blocked on the front foot

items.text: length in the corridor, clipped to midwicket off the back foot

items.text: beaten. Gets a length ball to shape in marginally outside off and then gets it to rise away as he looks to drive through cover

items.text: nice bouncer. Perfectly directed and viciously rising at his grille. But he does well to sway out of its way

items.text: creams it over long-on. Meets the length ball at the pitch outside off and swings cleanly to clear the fielder in the deep
items.shortText: Nurse to Mushfiqur Rahim, SIX runs

items.text: full outside off, shuffles and drives to long-off
items.postText: Dilip: "Hey varun just wanted to know the highest run chase on this ground?" --- West Indies chased down 266 to beat Australia by four wickets in July 2016
